description:
The six leaders arrive in Chuuoku where the special forces have started rioting due to the influence of Kaibyakumon`s drones. The second helicopter lands in Shinjuku where they start looking for the drones` control server, but they fall into Scuro`s trap.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tears Come from the Heart and Not from the Brain.
Tears Come from the Heart and Not from the Brain.
